title: Dutch watchdog considers Apple actions ‘insufficient’ on App Store payment system policies on dating apps
content:
After being fined 10 times by a Dutch watchdog group, Apple is still under fire for its actions regarding App Store policies relating to dating apps, with the Netherlands Authority for Consumers & Markets (ACM) saying they are “insufficient.” The ACM says it will need up to several weeks to see what actions it will take next.

more…

The post Dutch watchdog considers Apple actions ‘insufficient’ on App Store payment system policies on dating apps appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After being fined 10 times by a Dutch watchdog, Apple is still under fire for its actions regarding App Store policies about dating apps, with the group saying they are "insufficient."
